job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a seasoned software engineer with a deep interest in AI? Trilogy is on the lookout for exceptional engineers to lead the charge in adopting generative AI tools both in our development process and into our products.

   Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
     * TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
     * Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
     * TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
     * Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.

   Your role will focus on integrating AI into engineering practices, using AI tools to increase efficiency and solve engineering tasks like coding and testing. Based on the obtained results, you will derive recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team. Maintaining high-quality standards in our codebases while ensuring high leverage of AI tools across our engineering teams will be a key part of your work.

   You will be an integral part of our existing engineering team, working collaboratively on our suite of products to deeply understand our environment and needs. You will have the freedom to propose and experiment with new tools and then will leverage the insights and experiences obtained to evolve our processes, advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup.

   We seek candidates with a strong background in software engineering and a capacity for adapting to new technologies. Moreover, an interest in the latest generative AI developments and a drive for innovation are crucial. While our primary tech stack is AWS Serverless with TypeScript, we're looking for versatile engineers who can excel in a variety of technical environments and challenges.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing fully functional features, using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality.
     * Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting.
     * Documenting best practices and techniques in guides that enable others to harness the power of generative AI effectively.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Building new AI models from scratch; instead, your focus will be on leveraging and fine-tuning existing models to maximize efficiency.
     * Being confined to outdated technologies; we encourage an environment that thrives on dynamic tech stacks, fostering continuous innovation., * Drive transformative change by establishing a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity.
job_details.full_text:
Lead Software Engineer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $200,000/year USD

Are you a seasoned software engineer with a deep interest in AI? Trilogy is on the lookout for exceptional engineers to lead the charge in adopting generative AI tools both in our development process and into our products.

   Join us to work on our exciting product portfolio:
     * TeachTap: Bringing historical figures to life using AI, offering an engaging, TikTok-like learning experience to make learning more relevant and fun.
     * Educational Content Generation: Utilizing the latest in generative AI combined with comprehensive learning materials to create captivating content.
     * TeachTower: A game-based motivation system inspired by popular games like Roblox and Minecraft, designed to make learning irresistibly fun.
     * Coachbot: A learning copilot that integrates with existing apps, guiding learning paths, recommending next steps, and rewarding daily progress.

   Your role will focus on integrating AI into engineering practices, using AI tools to increase efficiency and solve engineering tasks like coding and testing. Based on the obtained results, you will derive recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team. Maintaining high-quality standards in our codebases while ensuring high leverage of AI tools across our engineering teams will be a key part of your work.

   You will be an integral part of our existing engineering team, working collaboratively on our suite of products to deeply understand our environment and needs. You will have the freedom to propose and experiment with new tools and then will leverage the insights and experiences obtained to evolve our processes, advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup.

   We seek candidates with a strong background in software engineering and a capacity for adapting to new technologies. Moreover, an interest in the latest generative AI developments and a drive for innovation are crucial. While our primary tech stack is AWS Serverless with TypeScript, we're looking for versatile engineers who can excel in a variety of technical environments and challenges.

   What you will be doing

     * Developing fully functional features, using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality.
     * Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting.
     * Documenting best practices and techniques in guides that enable others to harness the power of generative AI effectively.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Building new AI models from scratch; instead, your focus will be on leveraging and fine-tuning existing models to maximize efficiency.
     * Being confined to outdated technologies; we encourage an environment that thrives on dynamic tech stacks, fostering continuous innovation., * Drive transformative change by establishing a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes integrating generative AI tools into development processes and products, focusing on leveraging and fine-tuning existing models rather than building new ones from scratch. Key responsibilities include developing features using AI tools, experimenting with AI for engineering processes (coding, testing), and creating documentation and playbooks for broader adoption. The role involves building user-facing applications like chatbots (Coachbot) and AI-powered learning experiences (TeachTap, Educational Content Generation), aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. While software engineering is a strong component, the primary focus is on applying and integrating generative AI technologies.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'developing fully functional features' and integrating AI into 'products' and 'user-facing software systems', which are core to software development.
The description mentions 'building and maintaining production-grade security-aware user-facing software systems' as a core responsibility, directly aligning with software development.
job_tasks.phrase: building and maintaining production-grade security-aware user-facing software systems

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly states 'leveraging and fine-tuning existing models to maximize efficiency' and 'building new AI models from scratch' is not part of the role, indicating a focus on adapting and using pre-trained generative models.

The role involves 'experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting', which falls under the modeling aspect of applying AI techniques.
job_tasks.phrase: experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'integrating AI into engineering practices' and 'maintaining high-quality standards in our codebases while ensuring high leverage of AI tools across our engineering teams', which points to operationalizing AI within the engineering workflow.

The role requires deriving 'recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team' and establishing 'a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity', which are operational and deployment-focused tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: deriving recipes and playbooks to be adopted by the broader engineering team

job_tasks.justification: The role requires understanding 'our environment and needs' and aligning technical solutions with product goals like 'making learning more relevant and fun' and 'making learning irresistibly fun'.
job_tasks.phrase: deeply understand our environment and needs

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup' implies operationalizing and improving the engineering infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: advocate for new tool adoption, or even spearhead the creation of small tools, bots, and frameworks to enhance our technical setup

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality' in the context of developing features, which is a software development task augmented by AI.
job_tasks.phrase: using AI tools to expedite delivery and enhance quality

job_tasks.justification: The role involves 'performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes, including decomposition, solution design, code generation, and troubleshooting', which are software development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: Performing experiments with AI to enhance engineering processes

job_tasks.justification: Documenting 'best practices and techniques in guides that enable others to harness the power of generative AI effectively' supports the broader software development and knowledge sharing within the team.
job_tasks.phrase: Documenting best practices and techniques in guides

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Drive transformative change by establishing a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI, significantly amplifying engineering productivity' points to operationalizing AI for widespread impact.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive transformative change by establishing a framework that seamlessly integrates generative AI
